description: Feels like I'm hacking a terminal in Fallout New Vegas or something. Great app to impress others I bet, also.
Love the retro style.
really fun to use
100% will be using on a dialy basis
Being a huge fan of Fallout and The Matrix as soon as i saw this i knew i had found the one terminal that looked just how I wanted.

I've used cool-retro-term for years without any issues in various distros. But with Debian 12, it seems like at some point, the general window decorations/theming has changed or something else has gone wrong. Either way, even with dark theme, the window decoration is now white. I've tried to troubleshoot, but no luck. I'm now looking at alternatives, but I don't know if there are any others with "retro" functions.
summary: Was working fine before, but now window decorations are broken

description:
This is a great program, and not just eye-candy!
I had years ago two Facit "dumb terminals", and I can now have the truly cool look of them again!
the best terminal i have seen, also want color customization
Yup, does the job great! Wish i had more options
Kickass terminal. Some of the profiles are hard to read, but most are perfect. Would recommend using either Green or Futuristic. 10/10

Mostly a good app. It has what expected. It's cool, retro, and it's a working terminal.

I would love if there was customisation features, like the screen color, font, graphics settings, and a bit more of resolutions, so that neofetch/fastfetch could run a bit better.
It's the best terminal i've ever used!
It's cool and retro.
It looks nice, and you can customize almost everything about it.
No words, just an amazing feeling
Delivered as advertised.
In terms of terminal functionality it is minimal, and the menubars look awful on KDE, but otherwise this is an amazing project. I never thought I'd want to make Linux look like Commodore 64.
Lots and lots of customization options. You can emulate the old-fashioned terminals the way you remember (or imagine) them!
my "dream" came true
Looks really nice
Looks pretty fresh after usual terminals ))

Using this got a feeling of falling inside Tron world for a while. Glorious style. Personally love "Futuristic" profile over the others, though I think anyone could find style suitable of personnal image of analogue terminal. Bravo.
This really makes me want to use terminal more often.
summary: I'm crying with tears of joy

description: A convincing simulation of an old CRT display complete with reflections and artifacts as produced by the scanline, as well as noise. Very clever, brings back memories.
I really love the fonts provided with the program and the visual effects are gorgeous.
This is something I never knew I wanted. Watching dnf package upgrades scroll by on an Apple II display is very fun.
Really nice aesthetic and works just like you would expect any other termiinal emulator.
Like in childhood
One of my favorite termulator emulators. Pairs well with a Nuka Cola and Fallout Radio.

Visually stunning. Yet smooth and very responsive.
The terminal itself (with sane settings) is even usable for work! 
You can change the terminal size.

i used it for 1 year now,
very very cool
I don't know if I can manage to work with this kind of terminal on a daily basis, but it's extremely cool, it brings me back to the ancient days of IT! Thanks for the spectacular job!

It looks amazingly real! I've only checked out the default profile so far, but it was so cool playing with it, I didn't change anything. I remember when my monitor actually looked like this in the 1980's. Like the name says, it's definitely cool and definitely retro!

This looks amazing! Brings back old memories... (To all the old-timers, when the app is open, right-click in the window and change profiles until you see one you remember. COOL doesn't even begin to describe it. Select "Full Screen" to really get the full effect)
Also, it's a real terminal. Typed commands actually work.
I'm in love with this
This app is just great and makes you think about the good old time when computer where just machines :-)
dfdfdfdfdfdfdffa fdf
Fantastic terminal, love the look. All I need is for every time I press a key it makes that old fasioned click sound, you know the exact one im talking about.
summary: Amazing, one thing I would add

description: it isnt too functional on a day to day basis but it sure looks grand
Download this and witness the wonders of an ancient glory.
clever developer
Its really cool with different themes and all.

CRT is a great terminal application don't get me wrong but in the long run it's a bit on the downside. there aren't any tabs you can open or not. I Do know it's meant to be just a terminal that looks like a crt screen but it should be able to do more than have a delay when typing or what not.
summary: Looks amazing but not good in the long run

description: literally looks like im typing into an old TV!
Kudos to the author for making this a reality. Captures all the right moments.
nice u.i that i have ever seen
real computer arts!
Very, very noice

I don't often write reviews, but for this application I have to. The attention to detail is incredible. I should know, as I spent years repairing CRT monochrome monitors and TV's. The versatility and options available are too numerous to mention, and entirely realistic.

The application can be a bit difficult to get installed/running at times (I found the standard install process didn't work, however the standard Snap install did).

Hats off to the person responsible for this beautiful piece of work. I fully anticipate seeing this bit of eye candy being exploited by Hollywood, that's for sure.
Just like in title
summary: Its pretty good but it crashes a lot for me

description: Very cool Programm :-)
Beautiful retro effect. The Amber and Green themes are fantastic, the Futurstic theme is quite effective.
Super cool!! Back to the 80's Terminal
summary: Super cool!! Back to the 80's Terminal

description: Very retro & cool
Nice retro feel
This terminal looks retro and feels like that too, for sure ...
It is pretty much as good as it can get. Wow, what a nice retro feel. Thanks!
summary: Cannot be better than it is now

description: Really cool stuff!))

This is one of the more interesting and useable terminal programs in the repository. It was a bit gimmicky at first, but then once I realized you could remove the curvature of the screen to 0, it became a totally useable terminal replacement. Lots of settings to control the old screen jitter and bloom. Sure, it doesn't have split screen, but is unqiuely fun and calming too!
looks great only problem it doesnt have multiple tabs
Perfect addittion to this distro!
I wouldn't work using this terminal, but it's very pleasing to look at, and fun to play around with.
Very nice. I love it
Very good! I like this. I use.
Awesome terminal... i use it all the time... lovely feeling and glad to see it in the ubuntu store.

Not very practical but fun nonetheless, especially if you're into interactive fiction like the old Infocom games such as Zork. Get Frotz and go to ifdb.tads.org or ifarchive.org to get started with some retro fun!
really cool interface and smooth performance. Only issue is that there is no scrollbar and no option to open a new window or tab. Add these two and your app's a 5 star.
nice toy for casual console usage
it looks cool, but i wish the icon worked when i attach it to my taskbar
summary: no icon when added to panel?

description: This is pure joy. I am totally in love with this terminal. Very Good job!
Love it, good performance, nice effects!
summary: Love it, good performance, nice effects!

description: This is "useless" but so cool
Absolutely love this. Takes me back to using a 286 and turbo pascal. You've really captured the authenticity spot on. Jobs a good un.
i like it alot but cant stand using ctrl+alt+v as oposed to ctrl+v

This is a fun app and it looks great.
Makes me super glad I don't have to use an old monochrome CRT screen all the time anymore
Simply the coolest term out there.
Cool idea that I do enjoy, but I would like to see more customisation options for how it looks
Feels so good to use this, it's also easy on eyes and feels warm and comfortable
good job look great
it looks so cool, thanks
Hilarious, fun app
Proveides exatly what its name promises.

I really like the Command line, its my guilty pleasure of working within Linux. That said, I absolutely love the look and feel of this being a person who never got to live in the time of old mono-chrome CRTS, after all I grew up in the XP era. So probs to the guy/gal who made this program.
summary: Amazing terminal with some eye candy

WOooOO.... P**** c'est trop bien...

What a fun idea, really gives you the old school vibes, makes an everyday tool feel like a lot of fun. Good show.

I love iiiiiiit

yeahhh IBM 8088 PC portable computer screen look at last on my modern kubuntu... (the original 8088 I have still works btw... and they look the same now)

Reminds me of Fallout 4! Love it.
This looks SO COOL. As a retro electronic collector I. LOVE. THIS.

funzt prima, oder?

me gustó bastante
me encanto realmente se ve increible .

Vi las reseñas y me llamo la atención, cuando la ejecute ¡Wow! Es como tener una terminar de un videojuego pero que en esta puedas ejecutar comando linux e administrar tu sistema, le da un toque unico.

Excelente app! muy hermosa y recuerda mucho a las pantallas CRT antiguas. Recomendado 100%
me encanta, es buenisima!

Se los recomiendo es buenisimo tiene ese toque antiguo y se puede personalizar.
Se los recomiendo mucho.
se ve muy bien este toque de televisio antigua me encantoooo

Es funcional, la terminal al estilo fallout el color es muy bueno y da un aire de pantalla antigua
Faltan las opciones de customización y ya! Wow!
me parece muy buena y muy linda espero le sigan añadiendo skins preseteadas y funcionalidades pero asi como esta es HERMOSA

Este software es excelente, estuve buscando temas diferentes de terminal y este es precisamente lo que estaba buscando.

description:

The visual effects are fantastic, you have a bunch of presets/profiles (right-click -> Settings) to play with.
Great job!
Ca déchire ! bravo au concepteur et en plus en peut changer les couleurs du terminal. Encore bravo bravo bravo !
it's just awesome, would recommand ^^

nice job .$

Il est excellent, avec une très bonne cutomisation aussi possible en plus des themes déjà proposés !

Cool Merci

Superbe terminal entièrement personnalisable. Il dispose de superbe effet old school mais on peut très bien le personnaliser et lui donner une allure futuriste.

J'aurais aimé voir la possibilité de splitter l'écran en plusieurs partie. Il est possible d'y remédier en installant tmux. (Voir les commandes clavier de tmux pour gérer le multi-terminal sur Cool-Retro-Term).
Bonne idée, et très bonne application.
super et esthetique

Отличный эмулятор терминала. Как посмотрю на него, сразу вспоминается fallout.

Выглядит отлично, присутствуют визуальные эффекты, напоминает консоль fallout, еще в приложении есть настройки и предустановленные темы - можно изменить вид, подстроить под себя, есть тема напоминающая консоль из Tron Legacy
